metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1786 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s io_uring subsystem inthe way a user sets up a ring with IORING_SETUP_IOPOLL with more than onetask completing submissions on this ring. This flaw allows a local user tocrash or escalate their privileges on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
